howToBeAMan.title: Have a mission
howToBeAMan.content: Man who has found his why will answer any how

howToBeAMan.title: Goal orianted
howToBeAMan.content: Have goals for every day which you want to achieve

howToBeAMan.title: Discipline
howToBeAMan.content: It is your best friend, it will take care of you nothing ever will

howToBeAMan.title: Emotionally stable
howToBeAMan.content: Conquor your anxiety, fear and warth

howToBeAMan.title: Confidene
howToBeAMan.content: Beliefe in yourself, go even if you are burning inside

howToBeAMan.title: Boldnes, Courage
howToBeAMan.content: Nature loves courage, once you break the borders you will reap the rewards

howToBeAMan.title: Words never defined a man
howToBeAMan.content: Your action is speaking so load that i can not hear what you are saying

howToBeAMan.title: Your life WILL always be full of challenges and adversity
howToBeAMan.content: Embrace it, that is a thing about being a man

howToCalm.title: Mediatate
howToCalm.content: 10-30min is execellent to battle your overthinkg habit

howToCalm.title: Stoicism
howToCalm.content: Do not care about things out of your control (people, traffic weather)

howToCalm.title: Don't watch porn nor masturbate
howToCalm.content: Why would you watch other man having sex when you can do it with a real woman

howToCalm.title: Live on the edge
howToCalm.content: Daily expose yourself to your fears and insecurities

howToCalm.title: Don't think about past or future
howToCalm.content: People believe that the next moment is more important than now, and so they waste their whole life in expectations

howToBehave.title: Upright with chin up
howToBehave.content: Shoulders back, chin parallel with ground, chest up

howToBehave.title: Walk the Walk
howToBehave.content: You are not in a hurry, swaving shoulders and hands

howToBehave.title: Do no put your hands in pockets
howToBehave.content: What are hiding in there? Boner?

howToBehave.title: Sense of humor
howToBehave.content: Not to be a clown nor a jokestar, but to show your easy-going and fun nature

howToBehave.title: Listen
howToBehave.content: You have one mouth and two ears for a reason, use them

Appereance.title: Do not buy disegnare clothes
Appereance.content: Who are you trying to impress? You? Don't lie

Appereance.title: Well Fitted
Appereance.content: On your, neck, shoulders and biceps

Appereance.title: Exercise
Appereance.content: You will look good == you will feel good

Appereance.title: Scent
Appereance.content: Old spice on your armpits and neck

Woman.title: Your purpose is your #1 priority before any relationship
Woman.content: She does not want to be your #1, even though she will say otherwise

Woman.title: Never change your perspective for a woman
Woman.content: Dont change your attitude, point of view

Woman.title: Woman will always test you
Woman.content: If you react you lose, remain calm and stoic

Woman.title: What she says is not what she wants
Woman.content: She will test you, seduce you, taunt you, ready to chop you head off if you show weakness and ambiguity

Woman.title: She wants you to be in charge
Masculine prioritize his mission, feminine love and relationship
Woman.content: It should not be vice versa

Woman.title: Never clinge to her, nor be needy
Woman.content: Don't call her, control her nor limit her

Woman.title: Do not care what she says or does
Woman.content: If she wants to go out with her friends, let her go

Woman.title: Her love and trust will be tested via action
Woman.content: What she says is not what she feels

Woman.title: Never be indecisive with your woman
Woman.content: Always state either A or B

Woman.title: When she is in a bad mood, do not analyze her
Woman.content: Assume she is feeling unloved, and give her your love
